TitlePage.Abstract: &Circle; package The &GAP;4 package &Circle; extends the &GAP; functionality for computations in adjoint groups of associative rings. It provides functionality to construct circle objects that will respect the circle multiplication r \cdot s = r + s + rs , and to compute adjoint semigroups and adjoint groups of finite rings.
